name: Japan Center for International Finance
memberOrga: Japanese government, central bank, Japanese leading companies and banks.
goal: To research economic and financial situation of major countries as well as to keep abreast of development regulations and international treaties.  The outcome of the research is shared among members of our organisation, and is expected members to understand better the situation of countries where those companies have or will have businesses.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Economic situation, especially how to make the growth stronger and more solid.

JCIF Brussels research covers macro-economic analysis of euro-area. In addition to that we issue reports covering real time Euro area policy developments. All of our reports are based on interviews and other reliable sources (publications such as Europe Daily Bulletin and others, press conferences, Brussels Economic Forum, ...) For the interviews our staff regulary exchanging views with staff of following DG:
Economic and Financial Affairs
Internal Market
Banking Union
Competition
